曫字的基本解释

曫
luán
黄昏：“大桥潮水日曫流。”

曫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［luán］
［《廣韻》落官切，平桓，來。］
(1)傍晚，黄昏。
(2)引申为夜晚。

曫字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　曫； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页501第43
【廣韻】落官切【集韻】盧丸切，?音鸞。【說文】日旦昏時。　又【集韻】謨還切，音蠻。又郞甸切，音練。義?同。

曫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
曫字的起名意思

暂无。

曫
luán
Evening: "The tide of the bridge flows day by day."
曫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［luán］
["Guang Yun" cut off the official, Ping Huan, come. ]
(1) Evening, dusk.
(2) Extended to night.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　曫; Kangxi strokes: 23; page number: page 501 to 43
[Guang Yun] Shuoguan cut [Ji Yun] Lu Wan cut,? Yin Luan. [Said the text] When the sun is faint.　[Jiyun] Mo is still cutting, sound is pretty. He cut again, and practiced the sound. Righteous? Same.
